examples: The mechanic located the fault immediately.
El mecánico localizó la falla de inmediato.
Rescue planes are trying to locate the missing sailors.
Los aviones de rescate intentan localizar a los marineros desaparecidos.
I twisted my head to either side, attempting to immediately locate and identify the horrible stench.
Giré la cabeza hacia ambos lados, tratando de localizar e identificar de inmediato el horrible hedor.
We tried to locate the source of the sound.
Intentamos localizar la fuente del sonido.
